attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: Enables the Wyvern mount

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: Dis orc duz not need ta wear shiny stuff ta be 'da ardest an meanest greenskin around!
The standards of Savage Orc tribes are considered primitive and backwards even by most orcs and goblins and only the most feral greenskins and monsters will find them appealing

Leadership: +5 for Savage Orc, Forest Goblin, Troll and Monster (excluding Squig) units

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Orc choppas are crude and hefty blades usually swung with violent joy by their owner. A choppa in full swing can have a brutal, crunching impact on the poor fool on the receiving end.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Savage orcs konsida all otha orcs are too soft, us'n metal and uver stuff... even an unnatural kontrapshun dey call "wheelz"!! it´s time dey learn 'oo are da true followaz uv Gork an’ Mork!
Lacking any kind of technology more advanced than stone weapons, Savage Orcs must rely only in physical strength and endurance to beat down their enemies. And it´s often enough.

skillTree.localised_description: While all orcs are charging in a straight line, goblins will often try to flank the enemy and attack from the rear... even if it´s only because that maneouver helps them to stay as far as possible from the main fight.

skillTree.localised_description: Boars and Savage Orcs get along well, as they share an identical world-view and remarkably similar personal hygiene habits. This nearly bare brutes can ride through clouds of arrows and emerge unscathed (although perhaps much angrier).

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
A wise Boss knows how to lure the enemy into places where they can be ambushed or trapped with mobs that skulk in the tunnels below.

effects.description: Evasion chance when using the Underway: +6%
Evasion chance when using the Underway: +16%
Evasion chance when using the Underway: +30%

skillTree.localised_description: Raiders are good at marauding through enemy settlements - sending their denizens fleeing as their properties are despoiled.

skillTree.localised_description: Those that excel as looters make sure that every coin or gold tooth is found and added to the plunder. Woe betide the warrior that misses even a single copper token!

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +4%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +8%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +12%

skillTree.localised_description: Ravagers are merciless - they will sack an enemy settlement, take everything and kill any that get in their way.

skillTree.localised_description: These iron-hard gits are particularly tough and gnarly Greenskins, who - even if wounded - will be up and ready to fight before too long.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: Occasionally an Orc will come along who is more "kunning" than the rest. He quickly rises in ranks as his plans end in victory.
A Boss that has the loyalty of the mobs means he doesn’t have to worry so much about "da boring stuff" like tents and bedding, as they’ll fight for him no matter what.
Being green meanz ya really mean.
This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.localised_description: When you're clearly betterer than all the uvvers you need to shout the loudest, so everybody else knows you're the betterest.
"Dat a 'shroom in yer pouch? Give it! Give it to me!"

effects.description: Upkeep: -15% for Goblin and Night Goblin units

backgroundSkills.localised_description: You can't keep a good 'danca' down, especially when those drums start bangin'!

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: When a Warboss needs someone to talk, he calls on this "Boy wiv da extra pointy sticks".
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.
Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.
